basics.name: Christian Joudon
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: Currently pursuing a Computer Science degree at the University of Hawaii at Manoa with an expected graduation in Fall 2024. My academic background began in Biochemistry, granting me a deep understanding of chemistry and biology. Coupled with diverse experiences ranging from roles in the restaurant sector to filmmaking and creative endeavors, I'm equipped with strong communication and analytical skills. As I continue my journey in Computer Science, I aim to blend my creativity, analytical expertise, and industry insights to make a significant impact in the field.

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Manoa, Oahu

work.summary: Focused on creative writing projects, including screenplay development and literary compositions. Extended due to the global pandemic, this period provided an opportunity to hone storytelling and narrative structuring skills, valuable in both writing and data presentation.

Oversaw residential real estate projects, liaising with architects, builders, and designers to achieve project goals. Excelled in budget management and timeline coordination. Also managed a small-scale farm, demonstrating versatility and adaptability.
Provided high-quality customer service in a dynamic restaurant environment, developing strong interpersonal and communication skills.
Managed front-of-house operations and nightly bookkeeping, showcasing attention to detail and a knack for multitasking under pressure.
Handled various roles from food preparation to customer interaction, demonstrating flexibility and a keen ability to quickly learn and adapt.
Excelled in customer service, efficiently handling busy shifts and maintaining a high level of service quality.
Trained new employees and revamped menu offerings, utilizing analytical skills in recipe cost analysis and efficiency improvements.
